architecture
Class ArchHandler

java.lang.Object
  architecture.ArchHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
plugins.ISettingsHandler
public class ArchHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements plugins.ISettingsHandler

Class holds actual computer configuration - plugins and settings.

Author:
vbmacher

Constructor Detail

ArchHandler

public ArchHandler(java.lang.String name,
                   Architecture arch,
                   java.util.Properties settings,
                   Schema schema,
                   java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Long,java.lang.String> deviceNames,
                   boolean verbose)
            throws java.lang.Error
Constructor of new computer configuration and init all plugins.

Parameters:
name - Name of the architecture
arch - Virtual architecture object - plugin handler
settings - Architecture settings (Properties)
schema - Abstract schema of the architecture
deviceNames - Names of all devices (can be redundant)
Throws:
java.lang.Error - if initialization of the architecture failed.
Method Detail

setVerbose

public void setVerbose(boolean verbose)
Set/unset special setting "verbose". If it is set and a plugin asks for "verbose" setting, this will return the set value. The setting overwrites plugin setting.

Parameters:
verbose -

Method destroys current architecture

readSetting

public java.lang.String readSetting(long hash,
                                    java.lang.String settingName)
Method reads value of specified setting from Properties for specified plugin. Setting has to be fully specified.

Specified by:
readSetting in interface plugins.ISettingsHandler
Parameters:
hash - plugin hash, identification of a plugin
settingName - name of wanted setting
Returns:
setting value if exists, or null if not
